About me

I am a self-taught front-end developer student based in Chicago. I am currently using Free Code Camp in my learning journey.

I have worked in law for my whole career so far, which has provided me with the critical thinking skills and attention to detail that is necessary in programming.

Other: Salesforce, Jira, Westlaw, Lexis Nexis
